Class RptDeviceItem

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.reports.RptDeviceItem
public class RptDeviceItem extends Object
Contains info for a single device for a report request.
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

    • setSelectedClass

      public boolean setSelectedClass(boolean flag)
      Set selected device-class flag

    • setVisibleName

      public boolean setVisibleName(boolean flag)
      Set visible name-device flag. Returns true if flag changed.

    • getVisible

      public boolean getVisible()
      Get composite visible flag. Device is only visible if both (the device-class it belongs to is selected) -and- (the device name is visible (as specified by the name filter)).

    • setSelected

      public void setSelected(boolean flag)
      Set selected flag

    • initList

      public static void initList(ArrayList<RptDeviceItem> list)
      adds all supported devices to an ArrayList of RptDeviceItem

    • setVisibleName

      public boolean setVisibleName(String filter)
      Sets visibleName flag based on partial name match. filter string must not be null and must be lower case. Returns true if the visibleName flag changed.
